data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Throw-in Plymouth.
In the minute 2, Charles Breakspear signals a free kick to Portsmouth.
Free kick for Plymouth in the half of Portsmouth.
Charles Breakspear awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 7, It's a goal kick for the home team in Plymouth.
Free kick for Portsmouth in their own half.
Plymouth are whistled for offside.
In the minute 9, Plymouth awarded a free kick in their own half.
Charles Breakspear signals a free kick to Plymouth in their own half.
Own goal in Plymouth! Sean Raggett scores in his own net to make it 1-0.
In the minute 12, Portsmouth are caught offside.
In Plymouth a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Plymouth awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 15, Free kick for Portsmouth in their own half.
Ball safe as Portsmouth is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Charles Breakspear signals a Plymouth throw-in in Portsmouth's half.
In the minute 16, Plymouth to take a throw-in in Portsmouth territory.
Plymouth are in shooting range from this free kick.
Plymouth have been awarded a corner by Charles Breakspear.
In the minute 19, Charles Breakspear awards Portsmouth a goal kick.
Portsmouth have a dangerous throw-in.
Charles Breakspear signals a free kick to Plymouth in their own half.

Can Plymouth capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Portsmouth's half?
Ball goes out of play for a Portsmouth goal kick.

Can Plymouth get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Portsmouth's half?
Plymouth awarded a free kick in their own half.

Throw-in for Plymouth in the half of Portsmouth.
Ball safe as Portsmouth is awarded a throw-in in their half.

Plymouth needs to be cautious. Portsmouth have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Portsmouth in their own half.

Free kick Portsmouth.
Charles Breakspear awards Plymouth a goal kick.
In the minute 41, Free kick for Portsmouth in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Plymouth in Plymouth.
Can Plymouth get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Portsmouth's half?

2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Plymouth have a goal kick.
In the minute 45, Plymouth awarded a free kick in their own half.
The first half has been concluded at Home Park.
The second-half is now underway.
In the minute 46, Portsmouth awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Charles Breakspear signals a free kick to Plymouth in their own half.
In the minute 47, Charles Breakspear signals a throw-in for Portsmouth, close to Plymouth's area.

Throw-in for Plymouth close to the penalty box.

Charles Breakspear signals a free kick to Portsmouth in their own half.
Portsmouth are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 61, Plymouth drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Portsmouth have been awarded a corner by Charles Breakspear.
The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Portsmouth.
In the minute 63, Goal! The away team are now level through a John Marquis penalty.

Charles Breakspear signals a Plymouth throw-in in Portsmouth's half.
